message: Becouse It's really frsutrating to switch between the groups every single time that somebody posts something
Maybe you could create like a "chat room" where all of the messages come in
And you could respond to them by simply adding #topic at the start, just like in twitter
It's kinda frustrating to do it all the time
Actually the topic should be: Groups, topics and switching between them
Interesting, but topic names are so free form.. not sure how that would work
Could perhaps have a bookmarks/favorites bar
I'd like to have multiple topics open as tabs to switch between
Yeah, we've gotten that request a fair bit actually, we need to figure out some easy keyboard shortcuts for people to use.  And find time to implement it :)

Related to the tab switching, it actually would be nice to have some keyboard shortcuts within Convore to switch between topics. If the whole thing were keyboard-jockey friendly I suspect it would feel a lot quicker to jump around. Something like ⌘⌃[/] for topics, to sit close to ⌘⇧[/] used for switching tabs? And then another shortcut to bring down the menu (starting with groups) and just use ↑ and ↓ to pick from there?
I think we may have been slow to do it since none of us use keyboard shortcuts regularly I think
@ericflo @leah opensource the code and we can do it for you ;-)
keyboard shortcuts could likely live as a browser extension.
@ericflo try borrowing ideas from chat.stackoverflow.com, Gmail, or some irc clients, they are the ones that people got familiar with already

I searched through the topics to try and keep things organized, but I didn't find a better spot. And, well, this has been hinted at, and more strongly, convoread provides for this functionality. So, how about a firehose with either the topics that are being updated in groups to which you're subscribed, rather than only updating which groups have new content; and/or a firehose with the updates within groups to which you're subscribed? Perhaps I'm overlooking this somewhere? And I don't mean to imply that it's easy.
